channel.title: Help! Tried everything!
channel.description: I have the source Noobscape, (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,372737.0.html) and I cannot find a webclient! I have tried Tobex, that doesn't work. My character looks all messed up and has a weird name. Also the Bluurrs based client won't work on Tobex. It says the client is Bluurrs based, I tried using Ric's Webclient Tutorial and that didn't work. Please do not tell me to search or use google. I already HAVE! Please tell me how I can get a webclient, or if you can make one for me. If you make one for me, I will give you Moderator on the server when I release it. Thanks in advance- Josdog

item.title: Help! Tried everything!
item.dc:creator: @sheercoldpvp sheercoldpvp
item.description:
@sheercoldpvp wrote:

nnobscape eh? if it’s as old as the version i’m thinking of, then just use http://www.silabsoft.org or moparisthebest.com webclient just make sure when u go to log in u use 127.0.0.1 and everyone else uses the IP address u have made for server. if it’s an more updated version than what i’m thinking of. gimme the link as to where u downloaded it from, so i could further assist you.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Tried everything!
item.dc:creator: @josdog josdog
item.description:
@josdog wrote:

I have the source Noobscape, (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,372737.0.html) and I cannot find a webclient! I have tried Tobex, that doesn’t work. My character looks all messed up and has a weird name. Also the Bluurrs based client won’t work on Tobex. It says the client is Bluurrs based, I tried using Ric’s Webclient Tutorial and that didn’t work. Please do not tell me to search or use google. I already HAVE! Please tell me how I can get a webclient, or if you can make one for me. If you make one for me, I will give you Moderator on the server when I release it. Thanks in advance- Josdog
